beats.title: Get Current Theme
beats.userStory: As an engineer, I need `getCurrentTheme` to read persisted theme and apply classes.

then: it performs its expected orchestration logic

beats.title: Notify UI
beats.scenario: Publish UI State Change Notifications to Event System
beats.userStory: As an orchestrator, I need `notifyUi` to publish theme state in <20ms.

then: an event is published to the EventRouter within 5ms
and: the event contains theme value and source
the event is timestamped and trace-linked

movements.userStory: As a UI runtime engineer, I need theme retrieval to load and apply preferences without blocking initial render (≤1s P95).
movements.businessValue: Enables instant theme switching; reduces user-perceived latency; supports dark mode preference with < 10ms detection
